name: Encouraging each other, we held hands and defecated together
name_original: Encouraging each other, we held hands and defecated together
description: Aim to be one of the most violent VR game on earth, Encouraging each other, we held hands and defecated together is a VR arena shooter runs on PC and compatible with HTC Vive. This is the early prototype, May 16, 2018 build.
